title: Bulb Pot, 1770–80
markings: On underside of base: signed for Olery in underglaze with "S" brownish-glaze.
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2006: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Polychrome with oval medallion and allegorical scene surrounded by festoons (floral swags) and bees on three foliate scroll feet. Top with alternating blue, yellow sunflower holes.

tombstone.epitaph: Bulb Pot, 1770–80.Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2006-27-6.
